summary: This is an internal email from January 21, 2020, requesting subpoenas be issued to multiple major U.S. airlines for flight records related to Ghislaine Maxwell and an unidentified individual (likely a victim or associate) for specific time periods. It provides contact information for the legal/security departments of each airline to serve the subpoenas.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email requests subpoenas for flight records for Ghislaine Maxwell (also referenced as Ghislaine Borgerson) for the periods 1994-1998 and from at least July 2019 to the present (January 2020).

persons.name: Judy Gorham
persons.context: Listed as the contact name for Delta Airlines, Inc. for receiving legal subpoenas.

persons.name: Lisa Magdaleno
persons.context: Listed as the contact name for American Airlines for receiving legal subpoenas.

persons.name: Allyson Hawkins
persons.context: Listed as the contact name for United Airlines Corporate Security for receiving legal subpoenas.

events.title: Subpoena request for airline records
events.description: An internal email is sent requesting the issuance of subpoenas to multiple airlines for flight records of Ghislaine Maxwell and an unidentified individual.

keyFacts: As of January 2020, investigators were actively seeking flight records for Ghislaine Maxwell from major U.S. airlines via subpoena.
The subpoena request targeted two distinct time periods for Maxwell: a historical period (1994-1998) and a recent period from at least July 2019 to January 2020.
The request also sought records for an unidentified individual (redacted in the source) for the periods 1994-1998 and 1995-1996, indicating a focus on a specific person's travel during the mid-1990s.

The document provides detailed contact information for the legal/security departments of Delta, American, Alaska, Southwest, United, and JetBlue airlines to serve the subpoenas, showing a broad investigative approach.
The email demonstrates an ongoing investigation into Maxwell's travel patterns nearly eight months after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest in July 2019.
